Treasure Ring (Agate, Women)
kDesc
An agate ring enveloped in a gentle green glow, worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness: 7)[#Legal]
Une bague en agate dotée d'un léger éclat vert, portée au majeur de la main droite. (Échelle de dureté de Mohs : 7) [#Legal]
Ein in sanftem grünlichen Leuchten eingebetteter Achat-Ring, der am Mittelfinger der rechten Hand getragen wird. (Mohssche Härte: 7) [#Legal]
Un anello di agata avvolto da un delicato bagliore verde, da indossare sul dito medio della mano destra. (Durezza in scala Mohs: 7) [#Legal]
Un anillo de ágata que despide delicados reflejos verdes para el dedo corazón de la mano derecha. (Dureza en la escala de Mohs: 7) [#Legal]
右手の中指に輝く、なめらかな緑の光沢に包まれためのうの指輪。（モース硬度７）[#Legal]
오른손의 가운뎃손가락에서 빛나는, 매끄러운 녹색의 광택에 싸여 있는 마노의 반지. (모스 경도7)[#Legal]
An agate ring enveloped in a gentle green glow, worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness: 7)[#Legal]
這顆瑪瑙戒指沐浴在綠色柔光中，在右手中指上閃閃生輝。（摩斯硬度7）[#Legal]
這顆瑪瑙戒指沐浴在綠色柔光中，在右手中指上閃閃生輝。（摩斯硬度7）[#Legal]
An agate ring enveloped in a gentle green glow, worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness: 7)[#Legal]
